metadata.title: CVE-2016-10202 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Zoneminder 1.30 and earlierallows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the pathinfo to index.php.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10202` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

zoneminder - 1.30.4+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.30.4+dfsg-1').
